item.title: Mute On Text?
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Here’s an example, all you have to do is edit your chat packet;

if (Misc.textUnpack(chatText, packetSize - 2).contains("no-ip")) { return; } if (Muted() || IPMuted()) { Send("You are muted for breaking the rules."); return; }

Read full topic

item.title: Mute On Text?
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

okay well lately alot of advertisers on my server aand i was wondering, “isn’t there a packet that reads the incoming text?”

well i dont no the text or how i uwld use it so… why not ask 4 help?

well… lets get to buesness, i was wondering how i could make it mute ppl for 5 minutes if they say like “.biz” or “no-ip” or “.org”

heres my idea so far which i highly doubt wuld work

if (txt4(“no-ip”) {
sendMessage(“you have said an illegal word and have been muted for 5 minutes.”);
/muteTimer = ummm 5 minutes? idk its like… 60 x 2 x 5… 600?/ //cleared for thinkin lol
muteTimer = 600;
}

yes i free handed it, and i quoted it out just 2 show my thinking process?

any help apreciated (maybe a reward… HINT HINT)

hugs n kisses,
travis <3

Read full topic
